attributes.additional_details:
Developers are planning to build 275 Houses on Land from Moira Road Ashby de la Zouch up to Burton Road Ashby de la Zouch. We would like this to be Stopped as it will take away the last part of Countryside in the proposed area, will have Dangerous Access from every proposed Access/Exit roads. Be Detrimental to the Wildlife and will be built directly next to two areas that are designated for the Elderly. There will not be facilities such as Schools & Doctors to to cope with this Development.
 www.ashbywest.co.uk
